name: Shapeshifters and The Moon Adventure
description:
Ludum Dara 35 Entry

A journey to the moon and beyond it!

Help our young ascendents reach the wailing alter to become the moon!

FTL inspire level progression plus intense on button battles.

Transform your team into their spirit animals to conquer the forest of chance!

Instructions in game.

Mini Summary

Traverse nodes collecting resources and fighting enemies, each time you move you lose food. Moving without food cause you to lose hp.

Certain nodes act as alters that allow your team to shapeshift into their spirit animals

*You have to beat the game to collect a trinket

Game By

Oscar Morales & Selva Interactive
